PositionHistory.Title: Customer Service Analyst
PositionHistory.Description: Working as a Customer Service Analyst in Orange Business Services, Mumbai (November, 2013-Present). I am currently handling Network analysis reports for 13 Multinational Companies. I work on Analytics and reporting platforms like SQL, EXCEL, R, etc. • Generating and presenting monthly customer QoS Reports entailing Availability, Outage, Traffic Reports and Service Level Reports. • Performing deep dive data analysis for measuring Network behavior and Evaluate the SLA on various Network parameters. • Planning and coordinating Business Improvement plans by Analyzing Network reports across the Customer Service world for different customers. Analyst • Data Analysis of all the incidents occurring on the Customer's Network and get to the root cause of all the outages. • Looking after chronic fault management and data integrity issues related to the reports. • Preparing and maintaining current BCP (Business Continuity Plan) for each assigned account • Creating Root Cause Analysis Reports, in case of site isolation or major service disruption. • Developed and sustained cordial customer relations through deep engagement & delivering continuous value by meeting customer expectations and handling issues. Organizational Project (Team: 4) It was a recruitment portal which was used to take tests. Written test for candidates who applied for a specific opening in a team was generated along with the basic details of the candidate who was giving the test. The tests were already created in Admin Panel for each team. The result was displayed in Digital Recruitment various forms when the when the test ended. Portal Roles and Responsibilities: My role was to create and maintain the database in SQL in Backend. I was supposed to ensure all database servers are backed up and Test backup. INTERNSHIPS

PositionHistory.Title: Worked as a Graduate trainee
PositionHistory.Description: LG ELECTRONICS, Worked as a Graduate trainee in LG Electronics, Mumbai with the Corporate Team. I was a part of Mumbai Sales and Marketing team. May-July, 2013 DRDO(INMAS), New Worked as a Trainee in Institute of Nuclear Medicine & Allied Sciences (INMAS), DRDO, New Delhi Delhi on a project on Analysis of EEG signals at different Mental Stages using AR Modelling.

KEY ACADEMIC PROJECTS
• Voice Chat Application (Team Size: 3)
Developed a Voice-Video chat application using JAVA (JMF API) as a computer networks course
project. It was a LAN video conferencing project.
• Voice Recognizer (Team Size: 2)
Developed a Voice recognizer on MATLAB platform. Mel Frequency Cepstral Coefficients
(MFCC) technique is used to extract features from the speech signal. The speaker was modeled
using Vector Quantization (VQ). In the recognition stage, a distortion measure based on the
TECHNICAL
minimizing the Euclidean distance is used.
• Wi-Fi & Bluetooth Protocols (Team Size: 2)
A Survey term paper and comparative study which consists of many hands-on experiments. In this
paper we have discussed Protocols, Security, Network Size, Topology & Future Scope of
Bluetooth and the biological effects of Bluetooth. We have also given a brief description about Effect of
Bluetooth on Health.
• Term Paper on Partition of India in view of the novel "Train to Pakistan" by Khushwant Singh.
• Term Paper on Zenith of Communalism, Colonialism and Partition of India.
• A research survey of Popular, Grass-Root Level Food Vendors of Jaipur city. It was a survey and a
comparative study focusing on strategies followed by these vendors which made them compete
and stand apart with giant food chains.
• Land Resource Management: This project helped in setting up of Vermicomposting Plant, Bio-Gas
Plant, Vegetable garden, Rain Water Harvesting Plant and Nursery in the college campus.
